name: autoerotic

involving the use of your own body and imagination to get sexual pleasure: Scientists are investigating how yoga and related practices can foster autoerotic bliss. See

More examplesFewer examplesI like thinking, which is autoerotic, the mind being part of the body and thoughts.Masturbation is a common autoerotic practice.Experts concluded the man’s death likely was not due to autoerotic asphyxiation, but a murder.
